name: Xodo
description: An end-to-end encrypted (E2EE), keyboard-centric productivity app with unix-like commands
tech: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Web Crypto API, Vercel, Firebase

name: Aerolunar
description: A time series forecasting project that predicts air quality health index using lunar cycles inspired by the Chinese health beliefs tied to lunar calendar

name: Machine Learning Models from Scratch
description: A Python implementation of 8 ML models introduced in CS229

name: HongKong Instagram Username Identifier
description: A NLP pipeline that identifies HongKong IG users based on Romanized Cantonese linguistic features in usernames, without metadata
